CustomField.formula: IF( OR( AND( CloseDate = TODAY() + 1, /* tomorrow */ NOT(OR( WEEKDAY(TODAY()) = 6, /* friday */ WEEKDAY(TODAY()) = 7 /* saturday */ )) ), AND( WEEKDAY(TODAY()) = 5, /* thursday */ OR( CloseDate = TODAY() + 1, /* friday */ CloseDate = TODAY() + 2, /* saturday */ CloseDate = TODAY() + 3 /* sunday */ ) ), AND( WEEKDAY(TODAY()) = 7, /* sunday */ CloseDate = TODAY() + 1 /* monday */ ) ), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.label: Deal Signed & Paid Date Notify
